Description: Lower body sherd of Chian Mature Animal Style pottery heavy chalice; white slip; interior glazed black; traces of band of lotus buds in added white outline with added red centres; below, two white bands; exterior: two wide brown bands; inscription on exterior.
Curator's comments: The number 36 (a) is written in pencil on the interior surface of the sherd, and "List 36" is written in pencil on a paper label glued to the exterior, where the number 11 is written, also in pencil, directly on the surface.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1558) (phase 2)
